message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'org.nhindirect.xd.common.DirectDocuments' import. Should be before 'org.slf4j.LoggerFactory'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'org.nhindirect.xd.routing.RoutingResolver' import. Should be before 'org.slf4j.LoggerFactory'.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'org.nhindirect.xd.transform.parse.ParserHL7' import. Should be before 'org.slf4j.LoggerFactory'.
Variable 'resolver' must be private and have accessor methods.
